title: Quake survivors among the ruins
author: Unknown
text: A WOMAN AND TWO CHILDREN SIT IN THE RUINS OF THEIR HOME IN KOL, AFGHANISTAN. RESCUE WORKERS SCRAMBLED TODAY TO REACH SURVIVORS OF SATURDAY'S QUAKE, WHICH KILLED ABOUT 5,000 PEOPLE AND LEFT 60,000 HOMELESS.Caption:  PHOTOJOHN MCCONNICO / AP: A WOMAN AND TWO CHILDREN SIT IN THE RUINS OF THEIR HOME IN KOL, AFGHANISTAN. RESCUE WORKERS SCRAMBLED TODAY TO REACH SURVIVORS OF SATURDAY'S QUAKE, WHICH KILLED ABOUT 5,000 PEOPLE AND LEFT 60,000 HOMELESS.
